page.title: 16OTHER ROADS IN NTH.KILWORTH
page.content: {Main St.}leading from {Station Rd.} to the {Green}has mostly pre -victorian houses.The village shop is to be found there. {Hawthorn Rd.},off the {Green},is mainly post war council houses,with the Post House,thatched,on the corner. {Elmcroft Rd.}further east off { {Station Rd.}has later council-built houses at the top,but more expensive private housing at the bottom of the cul-de-sac. {Green Lane}leads from the{Green} south into {Church St.}and{Back Lane}. {Church St.,}with the Village Hall at the bottom,climbs towards the Nursing Home and Church,meeting {Back Lane}on completing the rectangle. {Dag Lane},off the Rugby Rd.and parallel to {Station Rd.}was built up in the 1960s.The new Rectory and the new school are to be found there.
